title: If staircase, lift & lift lobby areas are claimed free of FSI by charging premium as per then prevailing Regulation, then such areas to that extent only will be granted free of FSI without charging premium
clause_text: If staircase, lift & lift lobby areas are claimed free of FSI by charging premium as per then prevailing Regulation, then such areas to that extent only will be granted free of FSI without charging premium. If staircase, lift & lift lobby areas are counted in FSI in earlier development, then incentiveadditional FSI as stated in Sr. No 1 shall also be given on such area & such areas may be availed free of FSI by charging premium as per these Regulations.
section: 33(7)(B) Additional FSI for Redevelopment of existing residential housing societies excluding buildings covered under regulation 33(7) and 33(7)(A):
